row.process: :SET &Offset# = STR_LENGTH(&VAR_NAME#) :SET &hnd# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT(,,,"*&VAR_NAME#*") :PROCESS &hnd# : SET &line# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&hnd#,1) : SET &line# = STR_TRIM(&line#) : SET &pos# = STR_FIND(&line#,&VAR_NAME#) : IF &pos# > 0 : SET &pos# = &pos# + &Offset# : SET &line# = MID(&line#,&pos#) : SET &Result# = &line# : ENDIF :ENDPROCESS :CLOSE_PROCESS &hnd#
